thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text:
This was my first time using Ticketmaster Resale. I was a bit apprehensive about using the service however my local Ticketmaster Agency assured me it was perfectly legit and legal to use. Wanting to see Bruce Springsteen in Hanging Rock I went ahead and purchased a ticket for the show. Everything went smoothly, my first attempt didn't work out when the ticket chosen was no longer available. I tried again and was successful in purchasing my ticket. Confirmation was received of my purchase via email. There were no problems I attended the show and even met the man who had sold the ticket as his wife didn't want to go.
I would use Ticketmaster Resale again.
